home.title: The place where every journey begins
home.joinUs: Join the biggest travel community, created by and for travelers.
home.beFast: Be one of the first to register and get hundreds of prizes
home.descriptionFirstItem: You will be able to follow the routes of local people that will allow you to discover secrets and less touristic places of the city. You can also create your own routes and share them.
home.descriptionSecondItem: A community of travelers with the same concerns as you. People who are excited about the next experience. You can now share your passion without limitations.
home.descriptionThirdItem: As a community of travelers, contributions are rewarded. The more routes you climb and the more you participate, the more points you get and therefore the better the benefits.
